Title: Prohibits ranked choice voting and requires run-off elections for any election in which no candidate receives more than fifty percent of the vote; repealer
Summary: Prohibits ranked choice voting and requires run-off elections for any election in which no candidate receives more than fifty percent of the vote.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, the New York city charter, and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting ranked choice voting and requiring run-off elections for any election in which no candidate receives more than fifty percent of the vote; and to repeal certain provisions of the New York city charter and the election law relating thereto
